perturbation.original_text: Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the first year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in nine equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on March 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments on or prior to the fifteenth day of each of the next eight (8) calendar months.
perturbation.changed_text: Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the first year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in nine equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on March 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments on or prior to the thirtieth day of each of the next eight (8) calendar months.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by specifying the 15th day of the month for initial payments, but the 30th day of the month for subsequent payments, creating ambiguity on the payment deadline. It makes unclear which date is the deadline for payment.

perturbation.original_text: All payments that would be due pursuant to Sections 5(b) - (d) up to the date of any termination or expiration of this Agreement will be payable in full within thirty (30) days following such termination or expiration.
perturbation.changed_text: All payments that would be due pursuant to Sections 5(b) - (d) up to the date of any termination or expiration of this Agreement will be payable in full within fifteen (15) days following such termination or expiration.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the payment deadline after termination. Section 8(c) now states 15 days, while other sections imply different payment timelines based on monthly installments, creating confusion.

perturbation.original_text: NetGrocer may, upon no less than thirty (30) days prior written notice to Excite cause an independent Certified Public Accountant to inspect the records of Excite reasonably related to the calculation of such payments during Excite's normal business hours. The fees charged by such Certified Public Accountant will be paid by NetGrocer unless the audit finds a discrepancy of more than five percent (5%) with respect to the item being audited, in which case Excite shall be responsible for the payment of the reasonable fees for such inspection.
perturbation.changed_text: NetGrocer may, upon no less than fifteen (15) days prior written notice to Excite cause an independent Certified Public Accountant to inspect the records of Excite reasonably related to the calculation of such payments during Excite's normal business hours. The fees charged by such Certified Public Accountant will be paid by NetGrocer unless the audit finds a discrepancy of more than ten percent (10%) with respect to the item being audited, in which case Excite shall be responsible for the payment of the reasonable fees for such inspection.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation shortens the prior notice for audits from 30 to 15 days and changes the discrepancy threshold from 5% to 10%. This creates an in-text contradiction on audit notification timelines and the threshold for fee responsibility.
